content: x21 21 sts round 20 knit stop now to weave in both ends of cc round 21 k3tog x7 7 sts 3 stop again and firmly stuff body being careful not to overstuff break yarn and pull end through remaining sts using tapestry needle tail make 1 co 18 sts in mc leaving an end that will later be used to attach tail to body place marker and join in the round round 1 knit round 2 k4 k2tog x3 15 sts round 3 knit round 4 k3 k2tog x3 12 sts round 5 knit round 6 k2 k2tog x3 9 sts round 7 knit round 8 k1 k2tog x3 6 sts round 9 knit round 10 k2tog x3 3 sts round 11 knit break yarn and pull end through remaining sts using tapestry needle head make 1 co 16 sts in mc leaving an end that will later be used to attach head to body place marker and join in the round rnds 1 12 knit 12 rnds break yarn and pull end through remaining sts using tapestry needle comb make 1 4 co 12 sts in red leaving an end that will later be used to attach comb to head place marker and join in the round rnds 1 3 knit 3 rnds transfer all but the first 3 sts of the round onto a stitch holder or spare needle then working only the first 3 sts of the round knit 2 rnds as an i-cord break yarn and pull end through remaining sts using tapestry needle moving from right to left in order to bind off as an i-cord transfer 1 st from right end of stitch holder onto a dpn then transfer 2 sts from left end of stitch holder onto the same dpn you should have 3 total sts on the needle repeat boxed section above next transfer 2 sts from right end of stitch holder onto a dpn then transfer 1 st from left end of stitch holder onto the same dpn you should have 3 total sts on the needle repeat boxed section finally transfer the last 3 sts from stitch holder to a dpn repeat boxed section wattle worked flat make 2 co 2 sts in red row 1 rs kfb x2 4 sts row 2 & all even row ws purl row 3 k1 kfb x2 6 sts row 5 knit row 7 k1 k2tog x 2 4 sts 5 row 9 k2tog x2 2 sts bobble leaving an end that will later be used to attach wattle to head and body beak make 1 co 6 sts in yellow place marker and join in the round round 1 knit round 2 k2tog x3 3 sts break yarn and pull end through remaining sts using tapestry needle finishing when sewing pieces together i recommend using mattress stitch to create smooth transitions position beak on head and sew in place add eyes by tying knots of cc onto head use loose ends
